doc_class_description: A Court of Appeal judgment is a higher court ruling that reviews decisions of lower courts, shaping legal precedent and protecting citizens’ rights.

latest_doc_d.description: Mohamed Sawahir Hadija Aathika, Vs Pakeer Mohomad Asisa Umma, and others before Hon.Dr. Sumudu Premachandra J.
latest_doc_d.parties: Mohamed Sawahir Hadija Aathika, Vs Pakeer Mohomad Asisa Umma, and others
latest_doc_d.keywords: Finality is good but justice is better, Law assists the wakeful, not the sleepy Vigilantibus non dormientibus jura subveniunt,
